abstract: Algoma Steel said it had failed to reach agreement on a takeover by Salzgitter of Germany and had scheduled preliminary discussions with other potential buyers. Algoma said in mid-February that it might be acquired by Salzgitter at a price lower than where the company’s shares were trading at the time. Algoma negotiated with potential buyers in 2005 and renewed negotiations in February 2006 without reaching an agreement.

lead_paragraph: Algoma Steel said it had failed to reach agreement on a takeover by Salzgitter of Germany and had scheduled preliminary discussions with other potential buyers. Algoma said in mid-February that it might be acquired by Salzgitter at a price lower than where the company’s shares were trading at the time. Algoma negotiated with potential buyers in 2005 and renewed negotiations in February 2006 without reaching an agreement.

headline.main: Canada: Agloma Steel and German Suitor Part Ways
headline.print_headline: Canada: Agloma Steel and German Suitor Part Ways
